tags.name: Work Order ID
tags.query:
SELECT wo.ID
FROM WorkOrder wo 
JOIN WorkOrderSchedule wos ON wo.ID = wos.WorkOrderID
WHERE ProductionLineID = 1
AND GETDATE() BETWEEN StartTime AND EndTime -- going from pacific to UTC time

eventScripts.script:
target_tag = "[default]Sanford/Molding/SB01/Down_Sound"
    
    if currentValue.value == 0:  # Ensure you access the actual value from the QualifiedValue object
        system.tag.writeBlocking([target_tag], [True])
    else:
        system.tag.writeBlocking([target_tag], [False])

# Use readBlocking to read tag values synchronously
    cond1 = system.tag.readBlocking(["[default]Sanford/Molding/SB01/Historized/Machine Mode.value"])[0].value
   
    cond3 = system.tag.readBlocking(["[default]Sanford/Molding/SB01/Status.value"])[0].value
    
    # Check conditions and write to the tag
    if (cond1 == 1 and cond3 == 0) or (cond1 == 2 and cond3 == 0):
        system.tag.writeBlocking(["[default]Sanford/Molding/SB01/Historized/Count_Change.value"], [True])
    else:
        system.tag.writeBlocking(["[default]Sanford/Molding/SB01/Historized/Count_Change.value"], [False])

tags.name: Scrap
tags.query:
SELECT
	COALESCE(SUM(s.Quantity), 0) AS ScrapCount
FROM Scrap s
	LEFT JOIN WorkOrderSchedule wos ON s.WorkOrderID = wos.WorkOrderID AND s.Timestamp BETWEEN wos.StartTime AND wos.EndTime
WHERE s.WorkOrderID = {[~]Sanford/Molding/SB02/Work Order/Work Order ID}
	AND s.Timestamp BETWEEN wos.StartTime AND wos.EndTime
	AND GETUTCDATE() BETWEEN wos.StartTime AND wos.EndTime

    cond3 = system.tag.readBlocking(["[default]Sanford/Molding/SB02/Status.value"])[0].value
    
    # Check conditions and write to the tag

tags.name: Scrap
tags.query:
SELECT
	COALESCE(SUM(s.Quantity), 0) AS ScrapCount
FROM Scrap s
	LEFT JOIN WorkOrderSchedule wos ON s.WorkOrderID = wos.WorkOrderID AND s.Timestamp BETWEEN wos.StartTime AND wos.EndTime
WHERE s.WorkOrderID = {[~]Sanford/Molding/SB04/Work Order/Work Order ID}
	AND s.Timestamp BETWEEN wos.StartTime AND wos.EndTime
	AND GETUTCDATE() BETWEEN wos.StartTime AND wos.EndTime

eventScripts.script:
if(currentValue==1)
		equipment = "SB04"
		processArea = "Molding"
		plID = 4
	
		site = 1 + "/"
	
		system.tag.writeBlocking("[default]" + site + processArea + "/" + equipment + "/Status", 0)
		system.tag.writeBlocking("[default]" + site +  processArea + "/" + equipment + "/Andon/Andon Status", 2)
	
		# Activate Andon Event
		pEventHeaderID = None
		pID = None
		pNotificationGroupID = 5
		pTimestamp = system.db.runNamedQuery('Downtime/GetUTC')[0][0]
		pProductionLineID = 4
		pStatusID = 2
		pIsDelete = False
	
		params = {"pEventHeaderID": pEventHeaderID, "pID": pID, "pNotificationGroupID": pNotificationGroupID, "pTimestamp": pTimestamp, "pProductionLineID": pProductionLineID, "pStatusID": pStatusID, "pIsDelete": pIsDelete}
		system.db.runNamedQuery("Andon/sp_ANDON_AndonEvent", params)
	
		#Activate Downtime and tie to Andon Event
		pID = None
		pEquipmentID = 4
		pReasonID = None
		pStartTime = pTimestamp
		pCommentID = None
		pAndonHeaderID = system.db.runNamedQuery("Andon/GetAndonHeaderByTime", {"Timestamp": pStartTime})
	
		params = {"pID": pID, "pEquipmentID": pEquipmentID, "pReasonID": pReasonID, "pStartTime": pStartTime, "pEndTime": None, "pCommentID": pCommentID, "pAndonHeaderID": pAndonHeaderID[0][0], "pIsDelete": False}
		system.db.runNamedQuery("Downtime/sp_GEN_DowntimeEvent", params)
	
		#Set Work Order Status
	
		woID = [default]Sanford/Molding/SB04/Work Order/Work Order ID
		if woID != -1:
			system.db.runNamedQuery("WorkOrder/UpdateWorkOrderScheduleStatus", {"WorkOrderID": woID, "StatusID": 4, "plID": plID, "Offset": self.session.props.device.timezone.utcOffset})

# Use readBlocking to read tag values synchronously
    cond1 = system.tag.readBlocking(["[default]Sanford/Molding/SB04/Historized/Mode Continuous.value"])[0].value
    cond2 = system.tag.readBlocking(["[default]Sanford/Molding/SB04/Historized/Mode Semi.value"])[0].value
    cond3 = system.tag.readBlocking(["[default]Sanford/Molding/SB04/Status.value"])[0].value
    
    # Check conditions and write to the tag
    if (cond1 == 1 and cond3 == 0) or (cond2 == 1 and cond3 == 0):
        system.tag.writeBlocking(["[default]Sanford/Molding/SB04/Historized/Count_Change.value"], [True])
    else:
        system.tag.writeBlocking(["[default]Sanford/Molding/SB04/Historized/Count_Change.value"], [False])

tags.name: Seal Plate Installation Last Cycle Time
Top Cover Install Last Cycle Time
Impeller and Diffuser Install Last Cycle Time

eventScripts.script:
from com.inductiveautomation.ignition.gateway.services.tts import TTSEngineManager
	from javax.sound.sampled import AudioSystem
	from javax.sound.sampled import AudioFileFormat
	from java.nio.file import Files
	from java.io import File
	#from com.inductiveautomation.ignition.gateway import SRContext # Ignition 7.9
	from http://localhost:8088/web/home?2 import IgnitionGateway # Ignition 8.0
	
	#### Config ####
	project = 'C:/Program Files/Inductive Automation/Ignition/data/projects/Exchangetest'
	tempFile = 'tmp/tmpFile.wav'
	
	log = system.util.getLogger("Voice Controls")
	
	#### Set your desired message here ####
	# This example is working off of a String Memory tag, on Value Changed
	message = currentValue.value
	language = "en"
	
	#ctx = SRContext.get() # Ignition 7.9
	ctx = IgnitionGateway.get() # Ignition 8.0
	ttsMgr = ctx.getModuleServicesManager().getService(TTSEngineManager)
	
	if ttsMgr is None:
		log.info("TTS manager is not current available.")
	else:
		voices = ttsMgr.getVoices()
		log.info("Available voices: %s" % voices)
		log.info("Voice: %s: %s" % (language, message))
		if len(voices) > 0:
			voiceToUse = voices[0]
			for voice in voices:
				 if str(voice.getName()) == str(language):
					 voiceToUse = voice
					 break
			strm = ttsMgr.getTalkerFor(voiceToUse).render(message)
			
			#### Set a valid path for the wav file here ####
			filePath = tempFile
			f = File(filePath)
			AudioSystem.write(strm, AudioFileFormat.Type.WAVE, f)
			
			bytes = Files.readAllBytes(f.toPath())
			
			#### Set this to your specific client message handler and project ####
			system.util.sendMessage(project, 'TextToSpeech', {'soundBytes': bytes}, "C")
		else:
			log.info('no voices available - please install a voice pack')

target_tag = "[default]Moorpark/Molding/IM43/Down_Sound"
    target_tag1 = "[default]Moorpark/Molding/IM43/Historized/Count_Change"
    if currentValue.value == 0:  # Ensure you access the actual value from the QualifiedValue object
        system.tag.writeBlocking([target_tag], [True])
    else:
        system.tag.writeBlocking([target_tag], [False])
        system.tag.writeBlocking([target_tag1], [False])

# Use readBlocking to read tag values synchronously
    cond1 = system.tag.readBlocking(["[default]Moorpark/Molding/IM43/Historized/Mode Continuous.value"])[0].value
    cond2 = system.tag.readBlocking(["[default]Moorpark/Molding/IM43/Historized/Mode Semi.value"])[0].value
    cond3 = system.tag.readBlocking(["[default]Moorpark/Molding/IM43/Status.value"])[0].value
    
    # Check conditions and write to the tag
    if (cond1 == 1 and cond3 == 0) or (cond2 == 1 and cond3 == 0):
        system.tag.writeBlocking(["[default]Moorpark/Molding/IM43/Historized/Count_Change.value"], [True])
    else:
        system.tag.writeBlocking(["[default]Moorpark/Molding/IM43/Historized/Count_Change.value"], [False])

eventScripts.script:
logger = system.util.getLogger("alarmScript")
	logger.info("alarm activated")
	alarmInfo = {'tag': tag, 'tagPath': tagPath, 'alarmName': alarmName, 'alarmEvent': alarmEvent, 'alarmPath': alarmPath, 'missedEvents': missedEvents}
	system.util.sendMessage(project="PentairPilot", messageHandler="alarmActive", payload=alarmInfo, scope="S")

logger = system.util.getLogger("alarmScript")
	logger.info("alarm cleared")
	alarmInfo = {'tag': tag, 'tagPath': tagPath, 'alarmName': alarmName, 'alarmEvent': alarmEvent, 'alarmPath': alarmPath, 'missedEvents': missedEvents}
	system.util.sendMessage(project="PentairPilot", messageHandler="alarmCleared", payload=alarmInfo, scope="S")
system.util.sendMessage("PentairPilot", "alarmAcked", scope="S")

tags.name: Work Order ID
tags.query:
SELECT wo.ID
FROM WorkOrder wo 
JOIN WorkOrderSchedule wos ON wo.ID = wos.WorkOrderID
WHERE ProductionLineID = 10
AND GETDATE() BETWEEN StartTime AND EndTime -- going from pacific to UTC time

eventScripts.script:
if currentValue.value == True:
		status = system.tag.readBlocking(["[.]../Status"])[0].value
		plID = system.tag.readBlocking(["[.]ProductionLineID"])[0].value
		
		params = {"productionLineID": plID}
		woID = system.db.runNamedQuery("WorkOrder/GetActiveWorkOrderIDForAsset", params)
		
		if int(status) > 0 and int(woID) > 0:
			#equipment = self.view.custom.Equipment
			#processArea = self.view.params.ProcessArea
			
			
			#site = self.session.custom.ProductionSite + "/"
			
			system.tag.writeBlocking("[.]../Status", 0)
			system.tag.writeBlocking("[.]../Andon/Andon Status", 2)
			
			# Activate Andon Event
			pEventHeaderID = None
			pID = None
			pNotificationGroupID = 5
			pTimestamp = system.db.runNamedQuery('Downtime/GetUTC')[0][0]
			pProductionLineID = plID
			pStatusID = 2
			pIsDelete = False
			
			params = {"pEventHeaderID": pEventHeaderID, "pID": pID, "pNotificationGroupID": pNotificationGroupID, "pTimestamp": pTimestamp, "pProductionLineID": pProductionLineID, "pStatusID": pStatusID, "pIsDelete": pIsDelete}
			system.db.runNamedQuery("Andon/sp_ANDON_AndonEvent", params)
			
			#Activate Downtime and tie to Andon Event
			pID = None
			pEquipmentID = system.db.runNamedQuery('Equipment/GetProductionLineAsEquipment', {"plID": plID})
			pReasonID = None
			pStartTime = pTimestamp
			pCommentID = None
			pAndonHeaderID = system.db.runNamedQuery("Andon/GetAndonHeaderByTime", {"Timestamp": pStartTime})
			
			params = {"pID": pID, "pEquipmentID": pEquipmentID, "pReasonID": pReasonID, "pStartTime": pStartTime, "pEndTime": None, "pCommentID": pCommentID, "pAndonHeaderID": pAndonHeaderID[0][0], "pIsDelete": False}
			system.db.runNamedQuery("Downtime/sp_GEN_DowntimeEvent", params)
			
			#Set Work Order Status
			#woID = self.view.custom.WorkOrderID
			if woID != -1:
				offset = system.tag.readBlocking(["[.]Site UTC offset"])[0].value
				system.db.runNamedQuery("WorkOrder/UpdateWorkOrderScheduleStatus", {"WorkOrderID": woID, "StatusID": 4, "plID": plID, "Offset": offset})
system.tag.writeBlocking(["[.]Quality/Total Daily Count"], [0])

tags.name: Work Order Schedule Start
tags.query:
IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM WorkOrderSchedule
			WHERE ProductionLineID = {[.]ProductionLineID}
			AND GETUTCDATE() BETWEEN StartTime AND EndTime)
BEGIN
	SELECT StartTime
	FROM WorkOrderSchedule
	WHERE ProductionLineID = {[.]ProductionLineID}
	AND GETUTCDATE() BETWEEN StartTime AND EndTime
END
ELSE
BEGIN
	SELECT DATEADD(d,0,DATEDIFF(d,0,GETDATE()))
END

tags.expression:
Select Quantity
From WorkOrderSchedule wos
Join WorkOrderMolding wom ON wos.WorkOrderID = wom.WorkOrderID
Where wos.ProductionLineID = 0
ANd GETDATE() BETWEEN STartTime AND EndTime
tags.name: Target
tags.query:
Select Quantity
From WorkOrderSchedule wos
Join WorkOrderMolding wom ON wos.WorkOrderID = wom.WorkOrderID
Where wos.ProductionLineID = 0
ANd GETDATE() BETWEEN STartTime AND EndTime

eventScripts.script:
plID = system.tag.readBlocking(["[.]ProductionLineID"])[0].value
	OEE.addHourlyOEEDefaultHour(plID)

if currentValue.value >= 3:
		pEquipmentID = system.db.runNamedQuery("Equipment/GetProductionLineAsEquipment", {"plID": pProductionLineID})
		
		alreadyDown = system.db.runScalarQuery("SELECT * FROM DowntimeEvent WHERE EquipmentID = ? AND (GETDATE() BETWEEN StartTime AND EndTime OR (GETDATE() > StartTime AND EndTime IS NULL))", [pEquipmentID])
	
		if len(alreadyDown) == 0:
			# Activate Andon Event
			pEventHeaderID = None
			pID = None
			pNotificationGroupID = 5
			pTimestamp = self.view.custom.DateTimeNow
			pProductionLineID = system.tag.readBlocking(["[.]../ProductionLineID"])[0]
			pStatusID = 2
			pIsDelete = False
			
			params = {"pEventHeaderID": pEventHeaderID, "pID": pID, "pNotificationGroupID": pNotificationGroupID, "pTimestamp": pTimestamp, "pProductionLineID": pProductionLineID, "pStatusID": pStatusID, "pIsDelete": pIsDelete}
			system.db.runNamedQuery("Andon/sp_ANDON_AndonEvent", params)
			
			
			#Activate Downtime and tie to Andon Event
			pID = None
			pEquipmentID = self.view.params.EquipmentID
			pReasonID = None
			pStartTime = pTimestamp
			pCommentID = None
			pAndonHeaderID = system.db.runNamedQuery("Andon/GetAndonHeaderByTime", {"Timestamp": pStartTime})
			
			params = {"pID": pID, "pEquipmentID": pEquipmentID, "pReasonID": pReasonID, "pStartTime": pStartTime, "pEndTime": None, "pCommentID": pCommentID, "pAndonHeaderID": pAndonHeaderID[0][0], "pIsDelete": False}
			system.db.runNamedQuery("Downtime/sp_GEN_DowntimeEvent", params)
			
			#Set Work Order Status
			woID = self.view.custom.WorkOrderID
			#if woID != -1:
			#	system.db.runNamedQuery("WorkOrder/UpdateWorkOrderScheduleStatus", {"WorkOrderID": woID, "StatusID": 4})
				
			system.tag.writeBlocking("[.]Consecutive Scrap", [0])

tags.name: Scrap Count
tags.query:
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(Quantity), 0)
  FROM [Scrap]
  
  WHERE EquipmentID IN (SELECT ID FROM dbo.GetEquipmentByProductionLineID({[.]../ProductionLineID}))

  AND [Timestamp] > '{[.]../Work Order Schedule Start}'

eventScripts.script:
if currentValue.value > previousValue.value and ((currentValue.value - previousValue.value) < 40):
		value = system.tag.readBlocking(["[.]Total Daily Count"])[0].value
		diff = currentValue.value - previousValue.value
		system.tag.writeBlocking(["[.]Total Daily Count"], [value + diff])
		system.tag.writeBlocking(["[.]Consecutive Scrap"], [0])
		
		value = system.tag.readBlocking(["[.]Work Order Count"])[0].value
		diff = currentValue.value - previousValue.value
		system.tag.writeBlocking(["[.]Work Order Count"], [value + diff])

if currentValue.value > previousValue.value:
		system.tag.writeBlocking(["[.]Consecutive Scrap"], [0])

tags.name: Scrap
tags.query:
SELECT
	COALESCE(SUM(s.Quantity), 0) AS ScrapCount
FROM Scrap s
	LEFT JOIN WorkOrderSchedule wos ON s.WorkOrderID = wos.WorkOrderID AND s.Timestamp BETWEEN wos.StartTime AND wos.EndTime
WHERE s.WorkOrderID = {[~]Sanford/Molding/SB01/Work Order/Work Order ID}
	AND s.Timestamp BETWEEN wos.StartTime AND wos.EndTime
	AND GETUTCDATE() BETWEEN wos.StartTime AND wos.EndTime

tags.name: MQTT Quickstart
tags.value: This folder contains tags tied to an MQTT Transmission 'Transmitter' configuration. Any tags added directly under the 'MQTT Tags' folder will be published to the configured MQTT Server. Additional information about how to modify this configuration to represent different tag structures can be found here: https://docs.chariot.io/display/CLD80/MQTT+Transmission+Transmitters+and+Tag+Trees
